content.rendered: Mesotherapy is all the rave right now, if you haven’t heard about the treatment option for rapid and radical fat loss, preventing hair loss, for a better moisturised skin and much more, this post is a must read for you. Mesotherapy is a non-surgical medical treatment that targets the middle layers of your skin and involves an injection of pharmaceutical/homeopathic medication, plant extracts and vitamins and other ingredients into the middle layer of your skin for various effects. Here’s all that Mesotherapy can do for you. 1. Weight loss The procedure has also been called injection lipolysis (lipo-fat, lysis-breakdown). The therapy is especially effective when you want to get rid of fat that will not go away with regular exercise and a proper diet. Touted as the French way to lose weight, the technique developed in France and gained momentum and popularity from there. The procedure involves injection of certain chemicals that target adipocytes (fat cells) which then dissolve and die. The procedure has a high success rate and is especially useful if you want to lose fat around the places where fat resists loss (love handles, double chin). 2. Hair loss control Mesodermal injections of Vitamin A and E have also been known to arrest hair fall in its stride. The procedure is a quick one and one that can be performed with ease and with minimum discomfort to the patient. The results are amazing and they have to be seen to be believed. 3. Skin treatments Skin treatments such as deep moisturizing treatment, injections of vitamin E and other essential nutrients into the subcutaneous layers of skin have produced results that have to be seen to be believed. Ingredients liked hyaluronic acid, vitamins, minerals and amino acids are commonly advocated for the treatment. These substances replenish naturally occurring enzymes in your skin and deliver results that are quick, consistent and long lasting. It is a great option for men and women of all ages who want to get a younger, healthier, glowing and naturally elastic skin on the face and around the neck. What’s more? The procedure is as painless as it is effective. Scared of needles? The procedure can also be performed without them.
